title: Amoebanator: Early Risk Triage with Calibration, Decision Curves, and Transparent Thresholds
abstract: We present a lightweight, well-documented clinical ML prototype that emphasizes calibrated risk, transparent thresholds via net benefit, and a reproducibility stack (model card, dataset card, and interactive demo).
contributions: Conformal-style safety control of false negatives during threshold selection
Decision-curve driven tuning for pragmatic operating points
Full reproducibility: interactive demo, model card, dataset card

title: Montenegro’s Medium: Low-cost Culture Formulation Achieving 3–5× Growth for Naegleria fowleri
abstract: A practical formulation and workflow that increases growth yield 3–5× while reducing consumable cost, enabling broader access to experimental work.
contributions: 3–5× growth in bench tests vs. baseline

title: Organelle-Target Discovery: Drug Response Signatures and Mitochondrial Dysfunction Assays
abstract: Exploration of organelle-level drug response with bench assays and analysis pipelines to surface candidate targets.
contributions: Assay design and QC for organelle-level readouts
Signature extraction pipeline with clear documentation
